settings.title: Camera Settings
settings.subtitle: Adjust your camera preferences for the best experience
settings.cameraHelp: Choose which camera to use for capturing photos
settings.qualityHelp: Higher quality may be slower on some devices

camera.goodLightingDesc: Face a window or bright light source for best results
camera.centerYourselfDesc: Keep your face centered in the frame
camera.smileDesc: Express yourself - the AI works better with clear expressions

review.title: How does this look?
review.tip: If it's not right, retake; otherwise continue to choose a style.

style.title: Select your sticker style
style.realisticCutoutDesc: Background removed, clean edges, white border.
style.cartoonizeDesc: Convert to cartoon/illustration with smooth lines.

multi.placeholder1: e.g., Make sure the person is riding a horse.
multi.placeholder2: e.g., Make sure the person is riding a bicycle.
multi.placeholder3: e.g., Make sure the person is in an airplane.
multi.placeholder4: e.g., Make sure the person is riding a camel.

processing.title: AI is working its magic…
processing.keepFocus: Please keep this window in focus while we generate your stickers.
